Class SpaceGenerator

java.lang.Object
  SpaceGenerator

public class SpaceGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

SpaceGenerator uses a Gaussian random number to choose one of the six types of spaces.

Constructor Summary

          Constructor.
 
Method Summary
 Space randomSpace(int x, int y, int z)
          Generates a space (of type BlankSpace, RandTPot, FairTPot, Hold, PHold, or HoldQ) based on a Gaussian random number.

Method Detail

randomSpace

public Space randomSpace(int x,
                         int y,
                         int z)
Generates a space (of type BlankSpace, RandTPot, FairTPot, Hold, PHold, or HoldQ) based on a Gaussian random number.

Parameters:
x - the value of the x dimension of the board.
y - the value of the y dimension of the board.
z - the value of the z dimension of the board.
Returns:
a space of type BlankSpace, RandTPot, FairTPot, Hold, PHold, or HoldQ.
